column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: compensation. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix comp: <http://www.example.com/compensation#> .comp:Compensation rdfs:subClassOf rdf:Property . comp:salary rdf:type comp:Compensation ;    rdfs:label "Salary" ;    rdfs:comment "An employee's regular salary" .comp:bonus rdf:type comp:Compensation ;    rdfs:label "Bonus" ;    rdfs:comment "An employee's bonus compensation, typically dependent on performance or company success" .comp:stockOptions rdf:type comp:Compensation ;    rdfs:label "Stock options" ;    rdfs:comment "An employee's granted company shares or stock options" .comp:benefits rdf:type comp:Compensation ;    rdfs:label "Benefits" ;    rdfs:comment "An employee's non-cash compensation including health insurance, retirement plans, etc." .comp:totalCompensation rdf:type comp:Compensation ;    rdfs:label "Total compensation" ;    rdfs:comment "Sum total of all forms of remuneration paid to an employee" .# Define a class for the Employeescomp:Employee a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Employee" ;    rdfs:subClassOf rdfs:Resource ;    rdfs:comment "Individuals working for a company or organization" .# Define properties for employees to link them with compensationcomp:hasSalary rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has salary" ;    rdfs:domain comp:Employee ;    rdfs:range comp:salary .comp:hasBonus rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has bonus" ;    rdfs:domain comp:Employee ;    rdfs:range comp:bonus .comp:hasStockOptions rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has stock options" ;    rdfs:domain comp:Employee ;    rdfs:range comp:stockOptions .comp:hasBenefits rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has benefits" ;    rdfs:domain comp:Employee ;    rdfs:range comp:benefits .comp:hasTotalCompensation rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has total compensation" ;    rdfs:domain comp:Employee ;    rdfs:range comp:totalCompensation .
